004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d;
008import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
009import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableEntry;
010import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.Color8Bit;
011
012/**
013 * Ligament node on a Mechanism2d.
014 *
015 * @see Mechanism2d
016 */
017public class MechanismLigament2d extends MechanismObject2d {
018  private double m_angle;
019  private NetworkTableEntry m_angleEntry;
020  private String m_color;
021  private NetworkTableEntry m_colorEntry;
022  private double m_length;
023  private NetworkTableEntry m_lengthEntry;
024  private double m_weight;
025  private NetworkTableEntry m_weightEntry;
026
027  /**
028   * Create a new ligament.
029   *
030   * @param name The ligament name.
031   * @param length The ligament length.
032   * @param angle The ligament angle.
033   * @param lineWidth The ligament's line width.
034   * @param color The ligament's color.
035   */
036  public MechanismLigament2d(
037      String name, double length, double angle, double lineWidth, Color8Bit color) {
038    super(name);
039    setColor(color);
040    setLength(length);
041    setAngle(angle);
042    setLineWeight(lineWidth);
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Create a new ligament with the default color (dark blue) and thickness (6).
047   *
048   * @param name The ligament's name.
049   * @param length The ligament's length.
050   * @param angle The ligament's angle relative to its parent.
051   */
052  public MechanismLigament2d(String name, double length, double angle) {
053    this(name, length, angle, 10, new Color8Bit(235, 137, 52));
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Set the ligament's angle relative to its parent.
058   *
059   * @param degrees the angle, in degrees
060   */
061  public synchronized void setAngle(double degrees) {
062    m_angle = degrees;
063    flush();
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Set the ligament's angle relative to its parent.
068   *
069   * @param angle the angle
070   */
071  public synchronized void setAngle(Rotation2d angle) {
072    setAngle(angle.getDegrees());
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get the ligament's angle relative to its parent.
077   *
078   * @return the angle, in degrees
079   */
080  public synchronized double getAngle() {
081    if (m_angleEntry != null) {
082      m_angle = m_angleEntry.getDouble(0.0);
083    }
084    return m_angle;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Set the ligament's length.
089   *
090   * @param length the line length
091   */
092  public synchronized void setLength(double length) {
093    m_length = length;
094    flush();
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Get the ligament length.
099   *
100   * @return the line length
101   */
102  public synchronized double getLength() {
103    if (m_lengthEntry != null) {
104      m_length = m_lengthEntry.getDouble(0.0);
105    }
106    return m_length;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Set the ligament color.
111   *
112   * @param color the color of the line
113   */
114  public synchronized void setColor(Color8Bit color) {
115    m_color = String.format("#%02X%02X%02X", color.red, color.green, color.blue);
116    flush();
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Set the line thickness.
121   *
122   * @param weight the line thickness
123   */
124  public synchronized void setLineWeight(double weight) {
125    m_weight = weight;
126    flush();
127  }
128
129  @Override
130  protected void updateEntries(NetworkTable table) {
131    table.getEntry(".type").setString("line");
132    m_angleEntry = table.getEntry("angle");
133    m_lengthEntry = table.getEntry("length");
134    m_colorEntry = table.getEntry("color");
135    m_weightEntry = table.getEntry("weight");
136    flush();
137  }
138
139  /** Flush latest data to NT. */
140  private synchronized void flush() {
141    if (m_angleEntry != null) {
142      m_angleEntry.setDouble(m_angle);
143    }
144    if (m_lengthEntry != null) {
145      m_lengthEntry.setDouble(m_length);
146    }
147    if (m_colorEntry != null) {
148      m_colorEntry.setString(m_color);
149    }
150    if (m_weightEntry != null) {
151      m_weightEntry.setDouble(m_weight);
152    }
153  }
154}
